value.title: How quickly can HARSTEM dispose of noobs? (Part 1) | Holdout Challenge - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: We got Harstem to 1v1 noobs in StarCraft 2. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match for as long as possible. How did they fare against the Captain?
